item.description: [...] Energy Tough Love Blog placed an interesting blog post on The Best Blow Job Ever - Residential wind generation, the perfect balance to solarHere’s a brief overviewThe saying is, “the wind blows when the sun goes down”. While this a definite over simplification, it is true that on average their is more surface wind generated during off peak solar hours and so, if you are a battery user a small wind turbine makes perfect sense. In this area there have been amazing improvements in both efficiency and looks. http://www.abundantre.com/ A BUNDANT R ENEWABLE E NERGY ( ARE ) wind generators are as strong as you’ll fi [...]
